v.v: To you, Yahweh, I cry out; my rock, do not ignore me.
Hear the sound of my pleading when I call for help from you,
Do not drag me away with the wicked, those who do iniquity,
Give them what their deeds deserve and repay them what their wickedness demands,
Because they do not understand the deeds of Yahweh or the work of his hands,
Yahweh is my strength and my shield;
Yahweh is the strength of his people,
Save your people and bless your inheritance.

v: If you do not respond to me, I will join those who go down to the grave.
when I lift up my hands toward your most holy place!
who speak peace with their neighbors but have evil in their hearts.
repay them for the work of their hands and render to them their due.
he will tear them down and never rebuild them.
because he has heard the sound of my pleading!
my heart trusts in him, and I am helped.
and I will praise him with singing.
and he is the saving refuge of his anointed one.
Be their shepherd and carry them forever.
